posts.title: Exploring Nairobi's Coffee Culture
posts.content: Nairobi's cafés offer a wide range of locally brewed coffee and vibrant creative spaces. Java House and Artcaffé are local favorites.
posts.author: Lisa

posts.title: How to Start a Restaurant in Nairobi
posts.content: From permits to menus, here's what it takes to launch a successful restaurant business in the capital city.
posts.author: David
